title.newValue: Exchange: Cross-tenant mailbox migration now available (Public Preview)

description.newValue:
,This feature is for customers with multiple tenants. It allows customers to perform self-service tenant-to-tenant mailbox migrations using the New-MigrationBatch PowerShell cmdlet or the Exchange admin center.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/enterprise/cross-tenant-mailbox-migration?view=o365-worldwide
Preview date: October CY2020
